import React, { useState } from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import { v4 as uuid } from 'uuid' const AddTask = (props) => { const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const newTask = { id: uuid(), title: props.title, completed: false, } props.setTask(newTask) props.setTasks([...props.tasks, props.task]) setTask('') } return (
props.setTitle(e.target.value)} className="form-control" />
) } export default AddTask
